column4: Installed Wine and running uTorrent - Was using Deluge - When click on torrent wants to still use Deluge but would like to use uTorrent - Can't figure out to make uTorrent default app to run. Anyone have fix ? ?
Should be able to configure default apps somewhere in the GNOME or KDE control paenel(s).
Rt click on saved torrent file and go to properties to change - but uTorrent not showing up as selection.
